Text: Damn Yankees! http://twitpic.com/1s5o0u
“Find a job you like and you add five days to every week." --H. Jackson Brown Jr.
On the today show, Ashton Kutcher @aplusk just mentioned he got his twitter strategy of ICEE from the zappos guy @zappos.
It's a small world after all!  Bumped into Tony Berti at Disneyland.
At ACE awards in NYC. Besty Johnson just presented Zappos retailer of the year for accessories & handbags. Her pants had ZAPPOS on the ass!
Went to the U of M/ Penn State game today in Ann Arbor MI. The weather was sooo cold. Now I know why they keep saying GO BLUE!
The Jeanne Bliss book, “I Love You More than My Dog” came out today!  The final word in the book was written by @Zappos.  Great read!
"The job you do everyday is your recommendation." @zappos_tid
The high temperature in Las Vegas today was 99 on 9/9/09.
Fall must be just around the corner.  Pumpkin spice lattes are back at Starbucks.
In a restaurant in Brazil and can't read the menu. It's like greek to me.
Destiny is not a matter of chance, but of choice. Not something to wish for, but to attain.
Pizza night at Aurelio's. Aurelio's pizza only once a week to be fair to the other food groups.
In Cheyenne Wy at Frontier Days. At lunch and one of the appetizers is Bull Nuts. Gonna give'em a try. After all came here to have a ball.
Playing Blokus for the first time. @zappos recommended it. I'm try to stay away from the edge.
On a walk I saw a picture of the stars and stripes in a window. Below the picture of the flag it said "These colors don't run".  Happy 4th.
Forbes magazine was founded on these words..."Business was originated to produce happiness"- Bertie Charles Forbes
Looking at shoes on @zudini
Don't be afraid to go out on a limb. That's where the fruit is.
Just finished speaking at Progressive Insurance corp conf. I was very impressed with their company and culture.  Now off to the airport.
"The grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for." -Joseph Addison
Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm -Ralph Waldo Emerson.
On Monday KFC gave away free chicken. Today El Pollo Loco is giving away free chicken. Why does everybody want to give away chicken?
Excited about the relaunch/redesign of 6pm.com (our sister web site, lots of discounts)! - http://www.6pm.com
"We must never be too busy to take time to sharpen the saw." Steven Covy.  Continually improve and stop doing what no longer adds value.
The 08 Fortune 500 was announced this morning. It was the worst year in Fortune history. From $645B in profits in 07 to just $98.9B in 08.
Been an avid diet coke drinker for years. Gave it up monday n haven't  had one since. It's healthier but I sure miss that tasty beverage!
Found a cool site called boxee. It's app allows you to stream video from your mac to your apple tv. Can't wait to install and stream hulu!
Waiting on the tarmack. Our departure to SF is delayed 30 min due to weather in LV. Pilot said we were in the que. Wish we were in the bar.
Friday night pizza at Aurelio's. Walked in and the Zappos Helpdesk team is here celebrating a birthday. The helpdesk team sure has fun!
If you can't outwit them then you better outlast them!
@zech1000 said, never love something that can't love you back.
just visited the original starbucks in pike place market. Who knew it would ignite a coffee revolution!
Getting ready to take a little vacation for a few days. It's currently raining in Las Vegas so I'm headed to sunny Seattle!
Ordered my favorite royal kona coffee online and a coffee bean grinder from zappos. Maybe one day starbucks will do home delivery!
Working in the snack bar at the little league field. I'm selling the heck out of starburst and ring pops. Too bad I'm not on commission!
Just interviewed with Inc.. Now doing an interview with Footwear News. Anthony Robbins and CBS are in our office today too. What a Monday!!!
Busy morning. Laundry, email and baseball practice. Even saw a twitter piece on sunday morning.  Now time to get home and make a chili dog!
Meeting zappos_tid, zappos_mayor 4 dinner at my favorite pizza place, aurelios in henderson! Heard there might b more zappos people there 2!
Doc Romeo park for a corporate challenge tune up tourney with Zappos sofball team.
Henry Ford said, when starting his business if he asked his users what they wanted they would have told him they wanted faster horses
About to watch @zappos give keynote address at SXSW. Since it is a keynote I wonder if I'll have to unlock his message?
At the WCC bball tourney. Portland Pilots vs San Diego Toreros. Never heard of a Toreros but sounds like would be good with sour cream.
At baseball practice. They say the hardest thing to do in sports is to hit a round ball with a round bat squarely.
Crazy day at Zappos office! Lunch with Inc. reporter, funny video shoot for Ellen and now headed to my favorite pizza place Aurelio's!
Spring fever in Las Vegas. It's a beautiful day. I thought March was supposed to come in like a lion? Could it disguised as a lamb?
Out for morning excercise. Circling the new M resort. Opens at 10pm tonight. Still looks like a lot of work to be done. Hope they make it!
Watching a segment on CBS evening news talking about congress' new twitter craze. Interesting... GOP 2x more twitters than the Democrats.
Trying a new restaurant called cheeseburger cheeseburger. Ordered a vanilla egg creamer. Not sure what it is but can't wait to find out.
got in three miles and now going to put a few calories back on at joes crab shack. Server's t-shirt says "my waitress gave me crabs". Yikes!
Heading out for the first Black Mountain run of the year. Time to get back into hiking shape!
Just flew @JetBlue to New York. T.V.'s in every seat. Too bad mine didn't work. I watched the back of a some guys head. Not as entertaining.
At little league tryouts. Hard to believe it is already baseball season. A great sign that winter will soon be coming to an end!
Just sat through a DC's marketing campaign for 09. Very creative and fun! Can't wait to see more!... and they now sell snow boards!
Having dinner with Nike. Talking about culture and how important it is in having a long lasting successful company.
In Salt Lake City at Outdoor Retailer. About to meet the team from Merrell for dinner.
@shortyawards I vote for @PawLuxury in the Shorty Awards Finals for #business because...
Attended Dr. Vik's leadership Essentials this morning.  The course was very inspirational and heard lots of great feedback!  Thank you Dr.!
@Zappos_anglwngs it was great!
@favregirl it was delicious!
At Chicago Midway Airport getting ready to fly back to Las Vegas. Zappos_Alfred convinced me to have a Chicago style hotdog for breakfast.
Cold and snowing in Chicago. I'm glad I wore my Ugg boots to keep my feet warm and dry.  I noticed zappos_steve had the same idea!
Just left the CES show. From the looks of it, thin is in!
However beautiful the strategy, you should occasionally look at the results.---Sir Winston Churchill---
On a plane about to depart SF for the Winter Wonderland of Las Vegas!
Just attended the memorial for Al Jones. He had many friends and brought a smile whenever he was around. He will be missed.
@CherylSmith999 ufc= ultimate fighting championship
at mgm ufc fight with zappos founder nick swinmurn and zappos_ghardy and zappos_keith
Woke up at 5am and decided to drive to LA and take the kids Knotts Berry Farm. In line for our first ride. Kids are very excited.
Headed to play softball with zappos people. We are playing a team of bouncers. It's 108 degrees. I haven't played in a year. Oh-boy!
The foundation raised nearly $500k since its inception in 2006. Inspired by a late employee who spent his time mentoring and teaching.
At the Clarks companies foundation banquet in Boston. Their mission is to empower young individuals with a spark to achieve their life goals
thank you zappos_steve for driving and allowing zappos_ghardy, zappos_drobbins and myself to be productive.  we owe you a beer.
been on the road for 7 hours.  almost to boston.  had internet connection the whole way.  worked inbox from several hundred to 20 emails :)
Zappos_Steve driving.  Making good time to Boston until we hit the New Jersey Turnpike.  Have been trapped going in circles for 20 min.
Got to train station and tickets were booked for tomorrow. No express service today so we rented a car. Good news is it's half the price :)
Leaving PA and great partners at Dansko and catching a train bound for Boston to visit with our other partners and friends at Clarks.
Driving from Wilmington DE train station to Dansko Corp HQ in west grove Penn. New HQ is lead certified. They are very green conscious.
Just boarded a train bound for Philadelphia. Going to visit our good friends at Dansko.
Headed to dinner with Stuart Weitzman. With zappos_eileenz, zappos_steve, zappos_sgebhart, zappos_Sidary and zappos_clairebear.
Man just climbed the outside of the new york times building. Everyone cheered when he made it. Very scary to watch. Glad he didn't fall.
Watching a man climb up the outside of the new york times building in times square. Thousands of people watching.. Looks very dangerous.
Headed to an appointment with MBT. The footwear brand that helps tighten up your butt.
Just had a great meeting with MERRELL as well as UGG. The lines looked outstanding. Lots of great new product on the way!
In NYC at FFANY. Met with Lacoste this morning. Spring line looks great! Ugg meeting this afternoon. Can't wait!
@zappos forgot to bring business cards to Microsoft event. Fortunately, @zappos has me carry spare cards.
@zappos is on stage with bill gates. It's hard to tell who is taller.
Caught cold prior to visit at MSFT HQ. Listening to @zappos then Bill Gates key note in a few moments.  Hoping to avoid coughing fit dur ...
Zappos is the only full margin retailer at our dinner.
Just landed in Seattle. @zappos is speaking at Microsoft tomorrow. Forgot my jacket. 107 in vegas. Not so hot in Seattle.
The PM team just brought us lovely Zappos coffee mugs. I think I will go put mine to good use. The fuel that makes the world go round!
Eating breakfast, checking email and looking out over the ocean. Just saw a huge stingray jump out of the water.
A little boy playing next to me and @zappos at our dinner table just threw sand all over. Father was oblivious. Oh-boy
Zappos_Alfred. Stop twittering :)
read a great quote on the inside of my hat this morning. "do what you like. Like what you do.
First lesson of surfing. Remove glasses before going in the water. Lost them on the first wave. Ironically was surfing with Oakley.
Working poolside this morning with Zappos_Steve. Zappos_Alfred stopped by. Said he was going to his room to work on board meeting slides ...
@zappos getting interviewed at cabo pool party. Show your dance moves @zappos.
Played the credit card game with @Zappos, Zappos_Alfred and Zappos_Steve. Zappos_Alfred and I both lost one.
Doing email with Zappos_Steve and Zappos_Alfred. Zappos_Alfred just showed me the sea urchin spine in his big toe from this mornings sur ...
To clarify. I was not the naked guy.
At dinner next to the pool. A naked guy just jumped into the pool. I'm now done with dinner.
Update from Mexico Interesting fact. Want a pina colada? Beware... At 644 calories they have more calories than a Big Mac.
Just talked to one of the founders of Reef, Santiago Agudrre. Thanked him for being one of our top 20 brands.
The front desk does not believe it is possible for @zappos to locked out on his balcony. I must get security.
@zappos is now speaking to the audience of the simi surf summit.
watching a video of the day he surfed the 5th largest wave ever surfed globally... amazing.
At sima surf summit in cabo, listening to Big-Wave Surfer Brad Gerlach talk about surfing big waves and conquering fear.
Just took a picture of Zappos_Alfred in plaid. Follow zappos_Alfred for photo. Let us know if you find him fashionable.
@zappos can't twitter right now. He is at a dinner and his battery just died. ge is very annoyed.
On the way to the airport. Packed for a nine day trip in 20 minutes. Hope I remembered everything. Stay tuned.
Happy Birthday @krianbalma
Coaches fighting, parents screaming at an 8 year olds little league game. Adults setting a great example of the kids.
At the little league field on my laptop. Getting some work done between pitches. the weather is very blustery in vegas tonight.
Just hooked up apple TV. It is totally amazing! I've joined the MAC nation!
@zukeeper is making pizza at his home for @krianbalma, @kglynn, @southern1. He should teach a pizza making class.
Having lunch at cpk in town square. Considering stopping by the apple store and checking out the iTV
After 8 1/2 years of trying, Merrell is finally available for sale on Zappos!
Headed to see ironman and check out what all of the buzz is about.
was never a fan of stickers on laptops, but at twitter yesterday put one on my mac. now putting on a zappos sticker. sort of addicting.. ...
at sfo waiting for our flight back to vegas. it was a long day, but saw some great companies and met a lot of interesting peopole.
twitter just gave me a shirt that say's "wearing my twitter shirt". (Y)
after meeting @mchammer last night, checking out his site. http://dancejam.com/ [http://dancejam.com/] pretty cool.
sitting at twitter world head quarters in sf. enjoying working at a table instead of being in a cube. reminds me of zappos in the early  ...
Alas, petes coffee was too far from the hotel so I had to settle for starbucks. I always enjoy petes when in SF
Just met mc hammer... And I touched him!
Sitting with Alex our UPS rep. Telling him UPS needs to ship on Sundays to service a 24/7 ecommerce world.
In SF for meetings tomorrow. It's @zappos_steve birthday today. Will have to buy him a drink tonight to celebrate.
@Zech1000 that is very valuable info. Baja Bobs no carb no calorie margarita mix.  Happy cinco De Mayo!!!! And... Happy Health Awareness ...
Zappos_Alfred showed me how to use tripit.com today. Very easy to use in organizing your travel plans.
Twitter tip. Did you know that if you go to twittermail.com and sign up, you get a recap of all the @'s to your account.
Eating lunch with @zappos, zappos_Alfred and zappos_steve. Talking about twitter! @zappos is also giving me tips about my Mac
At the district walking through an art fair. Just commissioned a one of a kind zappos painting for my wall.
Breakfast at hash house a go go. Had to get here early to beat the rush!
sitting at the baseball field watching the kids practice and working remotely on my laptop via my wireless card. what a great morning!
The power of twitter is to faciliate serendipity. T. Hsieh. Circa 2008.
Headed to yard house for dinner. Many people had the same idea.
Just had lunch at white chocolate grill. Highly recommend it!
Just picked up my brother from the airport and now cooking a homemade spaghetti dinner!
Zappos university is going to be offering twitter classes starting next week! More info to follow.
Follow @kglynn for more information on the blowout memorial day party!
Follow @Eileenz if you want fashion updates!
Talking to Tom from Cole Haan about twitter. He hadn't heard of it but is now going to sign up!
Headed to third event, dinner with Cole Haan. Avoided nachos but more temptation ahead. Wish me luck! Cut 3300 calories, lose 1lbs!
Now tempted by nachos, potato skins and french fries! HELP!
@zappos says it's the last day before health awareness month so only a few more hours to eat junk food!
Being tempted by nachos. Must stay strong.
Juicy COUTURE clothing is coming to zappos! Woo-hoo
Jerry, the mayor of zappos, just licked my hand
At kennedys having a beer with AB. If you didn't get a chance, feel free to stop by and say hi. Will be here for n hour or two.
Thank you shill for setting me up with google talk!
At home making pizza.... umm, umm, good!
